[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.22.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Privacy

At Optima Tax Relief, the privacy and security of your personal and financial information is our highest priority. Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, share, use, and safeguard your personal information through your online and offline interactions with us.

Privacy Policy

California Privacy Policy and Notice at Collection

California residents may have additional rights granted to them under the California Consumer Privacy Act (effective January 1, 2018), as amended by the California Privacy Rights Act of 2020 (collectively, the “CCPA”). The below “California Notice at Collection” explains how we collect and retain the personal information and sensitive personal information of California residents in accordance with the CCPA, while our Privacy Policy for California Residents provides further explanations of how California residents can exercise their rights under the CCPA.

California Notice at Collection

Privacy Policy for California Residents

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” global_module=”12172″ theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row admin_label=”TrustPilot Carousel” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”50px||50px||true|false” custom_padding=”10px||10px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”rgba(234,234,234,0.5)” custom_margin=”70px|auto|60px|auto|false|false” custom_padding=”20px||20px|30px|true|false” border_color_all=”#1C50A4″ border_width_left=”6px” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#1C50A4″ header_2_font_size=”22px” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Let Affordable Tax Relief Help

Call 1-800-536-0734 for a free consultation.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_button button_url=”tel:8005360734″ button_text=”GET TAX RELIEF” button_alignment=”right” button_alignment_tablet=”center” button_alignment_phone=”center” button_alignment_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”6ead079b-43da-4313-8700-0192b4421332″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#040011″ button_bg_color=”#7CDA24″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”#0C71C3″ button_border_radius=”60px” button_letter_spacing=”0.1px” button_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” button_icon=”E||divi||400″ custom_margin=”5px|30px|5px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”10px|35px|10px|35px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”15px|45px|15px|45px|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”15px|45px|15px|45px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” animation_style=”fade” button_text_size_tablet=”16px” button_text_size_phone=”14px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” button_letter_spacing__hover=”0.3px” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on|hover” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#1C50A4″ header_2_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]
